title: on me by section 17 of the Immigration Act 2004 (No. 1 of 2004) (as adapted by
heading: 3. The Immigration Act 2004 (Visas) Order 2014 (S.I. No. 473 of 2014) is
text_raw:
3. The Immigration Act 2004 (Visas) Order 2014 (S.I. No. 473 of 2014) is 

amended in Schedule 5 by the insertion of “Mozambique” after “Moldova”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 November 2021. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd December, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [643] 3

title: on me by section 17 of the Immigration Act 2004 (No. 1 of 2004) (as adapted by
heading: (This is not part of the Statutory Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This is not part of the Statutory Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order further amends Schedule 5 to the Immigration Act 2004 (Visas) 
Order 2014. The Order provides that nationals of Mozambique are required to 
be in possession of a valid Irish transit visa when arriving at a port in the State 
for purposes of passing through the port in order to travel to another state. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [643]
